Java Code: while (i < 5) { if (i % 2 == 0) { even++; } i++; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
loop while i < 5
    if i mod 2 = 0 then
        even = even + 1
    end if
    i = i + 1
end loop

Java Code: while (i < n) { for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) { total += j; } i++; }

loop while i < n

    i = i + 1
end loop

Java Code: while (r < rows) { for (c = 0; c < cols; c++) { if (grid[r][c] > 0) { pos++; } } r++; }
